tips: Logging out and back in is a great way to go back to town for free (might not be worth it in first hour of league)
You don't need to talk to NPCs to get quests
One Man tag: Hit boss with everyone not in instance, port in, easy 1 man boss
Flesh and stone blinds mobs
Skitter bots slow mobs and shock(15%damage)
Leaving Izaro lieutenants alive gives you more keys at the end
At levl 50 and over, do all vaal side areas for 6-links, you can change colors in crafting bench
Don't obsess over every drop, prioritize sockets and links
7 vaal gems + sacrifice fragment = Vaal orb, with Vaal Orbs you can vaal your skills
Molten shell is a very good skill to vaal for Hardcore
Essences are good for easy leveling crafting

steps: On the beach (*The Twilight Strand*) kill first mob ⮞ to Hillock
*The Coast* don't kill anything ⮞ to *Mud flats* (don't forget the Waypoint)
*Mud flats* get the 3 Glyphs then ⮞ *The Submerged Passage*
*The Submerged Passage* get Waypoint, take Waypoint back to *The Coast* ⮞ *The Tital Island*
*The Tidal Island* kill Hailrake get Medicine Chest, town portal to go back to town
Turn in quests then Waypoint to *The Submerged Passage*
In *The Submerged Passage* look for long staircase or bridge
Leave town portal at staircase or bridge ⮞ *The Ledge*
*The Ledge*, Waypoint to town, use town portal you left at the staircase or bridge
Go right of staircase for *The Flooded depths*
Find and kill The Deep Dweller then log out
Waypoint to *The Ledge*  ⮞ *The Climb*
*The Climb* you don't really need the waypoint, killing The Faun to free Navali ⮞ *The Lower Prison*
*The Lower Prison* take waypoint, do **trial** on first level ⮞ *The Lower Prison* -> *The Upper Prison* kill Brutus, log out
Waypoint to *Prisoner's Gate* ⮞ *The Ship Graveyard* -> *The Ship Graveyard Cave* and leave a town portal in front
Find *The Cavern of Wrath* Waypoint to town turn in quest to get skill gem, then take your town portal (just entering the *The Cavern of Wrath* completes the quest)
Go in *The Ship Graveyard Cave* get the AllFlame and log out
Waypoint to *The Ship Graveyard* then find and kill Fairgraves, log out
Waypoint *The Cavern of Wrath* ⮞ kill Merveil -> Act 2
tips: Look for 3-link wands at vendor and +1 skill gem type you are using
Look for movement speed boots at vendor by using the search function, searching 'movement'
Pick up all small blues to vendor for alteration shards
Wait until level ~10-12 for league mechanics
Don't use chest armor, chest armor slow your movement speed
Tri-color tri-link gives you a chromatic orb when sold to vendor
It is worth killing blue mobs groups early, but not rare mobs as they give little value compared to the time it takes to kill
Frostblink is better than dash in many cases because it does damage
Freeing Navali give syou access to prophecies

steps: ⮞ *The Southern forest*
In town, head North West to *The Old fields* find and leave a town portal outside *The Den* then ⮞ *The Crossroads*
*The Crossroads* Waypoint to town and take the town portal you left outside *The Den*
Go in *The Den* and Kill The Great White Beast then log out
Waypoint to *The Crossroads* and head North to *The Chamber of Sins*
In *The Chamber of Sins*, get the waypoint, the waypoint points in directopm of the next level
*The Chamber of Sins level 2* do the **trial** it is most likely north
Find the long hallway, kill Fidelitas get the Baleful Gem then log out
Get Herald reward if no herald good for your build get Summon Skitter Bots, check vendors
Waypoint to *The Crossroads* head South to *The Fellshrine Ruins*
Find *The Crypt*,*The Crypt* loops around do the **trial** then log out
In *The Riverways* do Einhar's quest, get red beast then find *The Western Forest*
In *The Western Forest* get the waypoint (Allira is always the same side oft he road than waypoint and *The Weaver's Chamber* on opposite side)
Find and ⮞ *The Weaver's Chamber* and kill The weaver then log out
Get Support Gem reward and use waypoint to *The Crossroads* go north to *The Broken Bridge*, follow path , try find red beast if you didn't do it earlier
Kill kraitlin log out then back in , go to *The Riverways* , follow path north
Go to *The Wetlands* kill Oak and get the waypoint just north, Waypoint to *The Western Forest* and help Allira
Then find the path, follow it to Arteri, kill him and get the Thaumetic Emblem, log out
Waypoint to Act 1 get passive point reward and check vendor, waypoint back to Act 2 town then *The Wetlands*
⮞ *The Vaal ruins* -> *The Northern Forest* -> *The caverns* find and Waypoint to town vendor and check vendors
Waypoint back to *The caverns* ⮞ find *The Ancient Pyramid* and kill Vaal Oversoul (dont forget crafting)
log out vendor then waypoint to Act 3
tips: Still better not to use chest armor
Look for movement speed boots at vendor by using the search function, searching 'movement'
Doing Einhar's quest gives you a chance to beast craft a unique (high chance of tabula because of low level)
You can start doing the league mechanic now
It is worth going back to Act 1 sometimes, to check vendors at beginning of Act 2
If you check vendors in Act 1, waypoint back to Act 2 town, so when you log out you are saved in Act 2 not 1
You can vendor Armourer's Scrap for Scrolls of Identification

steps: Go north help clarissa dont forget to wait for herald
Go to slums ⮞ crematorium, wp to menagerie for unique
Wp crematorium **trial** kill piety log out get rewards check vendor for 4 links
Clarissa get keys, run back to slums ⮞ the sewers
Get wp and 3 quest items ⮞ marketplace
Catacombs do **trial** log out
Wp marketplace Battle front normally opposite of Catacombs
Battlefront get wp and quest item ⮞ the docks (if 23 go to  solaris temple first)
Get sulphite logout get passive point in town check vendors
Wp battlefront north to solaris temple get wp ⮞ lvl 2 get talc
Wp to sewers get crafting ⮞ Ebony barracks
Kill general gravicius (very rippy) ⮞ Lunaris
Lunaris dont kill mini boss get wp go to lvl 2
In lvl 2 watch for easy skips,
paths with 1 cart = right way 2 carts = wrong way best defense = keep moving
Kill piety get craft and logout
In town turn in quests wp ebony barracks ⮞ Imperial Garden
Get WP ⮞ Library is north get WP and continue find secret door
Get 3 pages logout, WP to library get missing gems
WP imperial garden do **trial** get crafting, tp to town get wp to 1. ascendency thing
WP imperial garden ⮞ Scepter of god -> kill boss
Go to aqueducts
tips: No need to go a1 or 2 now
Start looking for 4-link chests for lvl 31
Pick up rares for transmutes
Worth doing vaal side areas for vaal gems

steps: Aqueducts ⮞ town
Dried lake kill boss, get crafting , if underlvl (27-28 keep  clearing)
TP check vendors ⮞ The mines, get spirit
Crystal veins get wp and craft wp town get passive point then wp to Aspirant plaza
Ascend
Daressos dream ⮞ first WP -> krystal veins
Kaoms dream ⮞ Kill Kaom get Eye of purity tp vendor
WP to Grand arena ⮞ Kill daresso, wp to crystal veins
Turn in quest ⮞ Belly Beast -> lvl2
Bowels kill Piety (don't get hit by beam) ⮞ Harvest
Get wp then 3 bosses, boss ⮞ tp -> wp
Kill Malachai
Check vendors for 4-links, turn in quests ⮞ The ascent
Get crafting in ascent, go up to the Resonator
tips: Dont farm tabula in aqueducts
Aim for 60% + resists with crafting bench (cost transmutes)
Watch for items with 2 or + resist
Get Delve nodes but dont do delve until later

steps: Slave pens ⮞ kill Overserr
Go to town ⮞ talk to lani free ring
Control blocks ⮞ Kill justicar
Oriath Square ⮞ Templar's court take wp -> Chamber of innocence
Kill Innocence (Summon 10 packs each phase) avoid laser
Go out take wp to town, talk to bannon for jewel and flask (silver is best)
Wp back to chamber of Innocence ⮞ Torched courts
Ruined square ⮞ get wp then go to Ossuary
Get sign of purity + craft tp town vendor
Wp to Ruined square ⮞ south for Reliquary
Get 4 Kitava parts 4 corners
Tp town, turn in quest
Wp to Ruined Square ⮞ Cathedral Rooftop -> Kill kitava
tips: Granite flask is op early
Pick up all small rares (4 slots less) for shards
Level gems when loading into zones
Do vaal side areas if you dont have vaal skill you want

steps: Clear Twilight Strand tp town
Vendor, buy missing gems
The Coast ⮞ WP skip side quest -> Mud flats
Get Karui key then go left ⮞ Karui Fortification
Go in Karui Fortress kill Tukohama
Go up back to Karui Fortifications ⮞ The ridge
The lower prison get wp do **trial**
Go to Shavronne's Tower ⮞ Go up all stairs -> Kill boss
Go other side ⮞ Prisoner's gate (not worth killing Aberath now) -> Western forest
Get western forest WP ⮞ The riverways
Get riverways wp ⮞ The wetlands
In wetlands ⮞ Spawning ground, kill boss
Tp to town, vendor place items into currency tab , turn in quests for 4 link helm
Wp to The riverways ⮞ Southern Forest
Get wp go to Cavern of Anger (ignore betrayal)
Go to the Beacon get WP get crafting, do the pillar things
Click switch and the beacon, then run opposite direction, Weylam will be instantly there
talk to weylam go to Brine King reef ⮞ kill Brine King (if lazy or low on cold resist make portal to avoid lightning stage)
tips: Try resist cap at crafting in Hideout
If skills permit use rarety on kill support gem

steps: Broken bridge ⮞ get locket for flask - Crossroads (don't forget beasts)
WP to town, do menagerie if beast gave something good
Wp Crossroads ⮞ fellshrine ruins -> The crypt
The crypt do **trial** (get crafting) ⮞ lvl 2 in Sarcafucus
Get maligaro's map, tp to town, turn in quests
Wp to Crossroads ⮞ Chamber of Sins, get crafting and put in the maligaro map
Kill maligaro then tp out
Get obsidian key and continue to Chamber of sins lvl 2
Chamber of sins lvl 2 do the **trial** ⮞ The den
In the Den get wp ⮞ Ashen fields
Ashen fields get wp ⮞ Fortress Encampent
Kill Greust ⮞ Northern forest -> wp to town turn in quests
Wp Prisoners gate ⮞ Valley of the soul drinker kill aberath (around 1.6k life) tp to town, turn in quest
Wp to northern forest ⮞ The dread thicket
In the Dread thicket get all 7 firefly's ⮞ den despair (if hc wait til later)
Go back to dread thicket get fireflys and craft, tp to town
Turn in quests, wp to Nothern Forest
Northern forest ⮞ The causeway get craftin and wp, do alva to get her in hideout ->  Vaal city
If arrive and big hole follow ledge to left then up to WP talk to yeena
Wp to town turn in quests wp to Plaza (Dont forget to set soul of Ralakesh in the pantheon for less bleeding damage)
Ascend (Don't forget crafting)
Vendor wp to Vaal city ⮞ Temple of decay
Temple of decay ⮞ lvl 2 get craft
Temple of decay lvl 2 ⮞ Arakaali's web, Kill Arakaali
tips: Get granite flask
Beast worth doing
Keep enduring flasks ( worth 3-4 chaos beginning league)
LvL 50 start doing vaal areas again

steps: Sarn Ramparts get wp ⮞ Sarn encampment
Vendor ⮞ The toxic conduits
The toxic conduits ⮞ Deodre's Cesspool -> The cauldron, kill Deodre (stay melee range use granite flask)
Sewer Outlet ⮞ get wp and craft -> The Quay
The quay get the Ankh ⮞ Resurection Site talk to clarissa and kill Tolman
Back to the Quay and continue ⮞ Grain gate
Grain gate get wp ⮞ The imperial fields
Imperial fields follow path get wp ⮞ Solaris temple
Solaris temple lvl 1 get wp ⮞ lvl 2
Solaris temple lvl 2 ⮞ Go in portal, kill Dawn get crafting
Tp to town turn in quests wp Solaris lvl 1
Solaris lvl 1 ⮞ Solaris concourse get wp -> The Harbour Bridge
The Harbour bridge ⮞ Lunaris concourse get wp -> Lunaris temple
Lunaris temple lvl1 get wp ⮞  lvl 2
Lunaris temple lvl 2  ⮞ Go in portal kill Dusk get crafting, tp to town
Turn in quest wp to Solaris Concourse
Solaris Concourse ⮞ Harbour Bridge -> The Sky shrine
The Sky shrine, kill bosses (keep moving avoid skills) ⮞ Blood aqueducts
Can farm blood aqueducts and do delve
Go back to bath house (a8) to do Trial and get crafting
Go to high gardens (a8) ⮞ Pools of terror, kill Yugul, tp town turn in quests
To up to the Descent ⮞ keep going down -> The vastiri desert
The vastiri desert get wp and craft ⮞ Do side quest defeat the mummies -> Get storm blade
tp to town turn in quests ⮞ wp back to vastiri desert -> The oasis, kill SHakari tp town
Wp back to the vastiri desert ⮞ The foothills (normally north)
The foothills get wp, go in to boiling lake ⮞ -> kill the basiliks get craft
TP to town, wp to the foothills ⮞ get the Calendar of fortune quest item -> The tunnels
The tunnels do the **trial** get crafting  ⮞ get wp -> The quarry
The quarry, get crafting and wp in middle go north => the refinery, kill general , get quest item Trarthan Powder
Tp to town turn in quests wp back to The quarry go left to ⮞ Shrine of the winds, kill bosses
Tp to town, turn in quests, ⮞ wp to the quarry -> belly of the beast
belly of the beast ⮞ The Rotting core -> The black core
Shavronne's Sorrow, kill Shavronne ⮞ back to rotting core
Doedre's Despair, kill Doedre ⮞ back to rotting core
Maligaro's Misery, kill Maligaro ⮞ back to rotting core, talk to sin
The black heart, kill Boss tp to town, take WP to Oriath Docks
tips: Focus movement speed and life on items
Check prophecies
Don't forget to craft in hideout for res cap
Can farm blood aqueducts and do delve
Ziz farms blood aqueducts for 2 hours and gets a Tabula with humility cards
SSF go to a1 get bunch of skill gems and 2 wands with 3 sockets to lvl skill gems, to later vaal a lvl 20/20 gem to get a lvl 21

steps: Go to the Cathedral rooftop ⮞ Cathedral Apex, save Bannon
Go back to cathedral rooftop ⮞ Ravaged square
Ravaged square get wp, make tp on bridge before wp, wp to town vendor ⮞ take tp back to ravaged square
Ravaged square ⮞ The control blocks ( if hc you can skip Vilenta is Rippy)
The control blocks, take wp ⮞ find holes in gates to skip with movement skill
Go in arena kill Vilenta tp to town
Turn in quests wp to Ravaged square ⮞ The ossuary
The ossuary ⮞ Get Elixir of Allure, do the **Trial** tp to town
Turn in quests wp to Ravaged Square ⮞ the torched courts
The torched courts ⮞ The desecrated courts take wp, get craft -> The sancrum of innocence
Kill Avarius, pick up staff of purity, tp to town, vendor turn in quests
if lvl 68, do ascendency, if SC and want to rush to maps go ahead, if HC Strongly recommended to farm blood aqueducts get ~lvl 70 then do ascendency
Wp to the Ravaged Square, talk to innocence ⮞ The Canals
⮞ The Canals -> The feeding through, get crafting -> Altar of Hunger
Altar of Hunger, Kill Kitava talk to sin, take portal to Oriath
In Oriath, talk to lani, get movement speed crafting top left of city
